metadata.name: 九龍皇帝#1
metadata.description:
https://cosmosartnft.com/tsang-tsou-choi-street-graffiti-nft/

近代香港人所皆知，曾灶財是著名的已故香港街頭塗鴉者，經常於不同地區出沒，於配電箱、天橋、樓梯下、斜坡石牆等公共地方，以毛筆及黑色顏料書寫並講及家族歷史，宣示其九龍的「主權」。
由香港藝術評論家、曾灶財好友兼擁有其書法版權的劉健威，及曾氏家人授權，劉氏委托李振民以曾灶財作品發行NFT藝術品，以及使用曾灶財作品以聯合再創作形式設計及發行新系列NFT藝術品，讓曾灶財作品再次於虛擬世界重見天日，並使用區塊鏈技術永遠流存。

Tsang Tsou-choi (曾灶財) is well-known in Hong Kong for his graffities. He kept wandering around public places like flyovers, stairs, distribution boxes and slopes etc, writing with brushes and black paint, telling his family history and declaring his “sovereignty” over Kowloon.
Authorized by Tsang’s family and Lau Kin-wai (劉健威), a Hong Kong art critic and Tsang’s close friend who owns the copyright of his “calligraphy”, Lau has invited Sunny Lee (李振民) to design a series of digital artwork and NFT based on Tsang’s writing style and authentic artwork, so that Tsang’s work can be seen in a contemporary way in the virtual world and saved with blockchain technology forever.
